We'll meet once a month to exchange ideas and talk about what we're working on, types of frameworks, coding languages, demos & etc.

In the future I want to bring in scientists from Facebook, Google and other companies that have scaled up research and applied it in their products.

All levels of expertise are welcome. You could be a student with a keen interest in AI, a scientist looking for case studies of applied machine learning or a startup wanting to meet other startups who are also in this industry.

results.description:
CommonTruce serves as a platform for professional people of color to unite in key aspects of life. 

It is actively turning strangers into friends and creating a network that will span across the country. Although it serves multiple functions, its main focus is to re-establish communication between men and women of color. Fostering healthier relationships will benefit us all personally in every aspect of life.

Do you aspire to connect with others?

CommonTruce Social acts as a bridge that draws men and women of color together. With a focus on re-establishing communication, resolution to our issues will be addressed in different ways. CommonTruce Dating and Relationship Q&A serves as a platform for us to address the issues that plague us as a community. Tabernacle Tuesdays #Preach is a podium to share monumental events in your personal lives to help prevent others from repeating the same mistakes. These prime events, in addition to local wine tastings, comedy shows, happy hours and other entertainment activities, compose the social experience which brings us together.

Do you desire change in your community?

CommonTruce Community is geared towards building the community we all envision. In order to generate any change, we have to play an active role. CommonTruce: Professional Dress Workshop has become a staple to educate young men of color on grooming, hygiene, and presentation. Each city will form working relationships with local programs, such as Bread for the City, Boys & Girls Club, Habitat for Humanity, assist in volunteer efforts and support where the need is great.

Do you possess an interest in traveling?

CommonTruce Travel affords the opportunity for individuals interested in traveling to do so with others. Whether it’s a quick weekend getaway to the beach or a lavish 5-day international voyage, we all need to maintain balance as working adults. There is nothing wrong with enjoying your downtime with like-minded young professionals.

Anything else I need to know before I join CommonTruce?

Membership does not hinge on your relationship status, ethnic origin or which aspect intrigues you most. What is sought after is your active participation in any of the areas you care to be involved in. The mission speaks for itself: CommonTruce is more than a social group..it's a movement.
results.name: CommonTruce NYC

If you don't have time to commit to a team, if you can't pay expensive fees to play in Team leagues in the city, if you are not available for the strict schedule required by team leagues, if you want to show up at your convenience and play without being tied to a specific team , then we have the answer: Our organisation is a Competitive Co-Ed Drop in Sports League for classy, respectful and open mind ladies and gentlemen who play for fun, for the love of the game, and more importantly to make good friends for life, exercise and stay sharp and healthy.

To participate,

results.description:
I REALIZE PRIVACY IS IMPORTANT, THIS GROUP IS PRIVATE SO ONLY CURRENT GROUP MEMBERS CAN SEE OTHER MEMBERS OF THE GROUP & MEMBERSHIP MUST ALSO BE APPROVED BY ME


Do you feel your romantic life is not meeting its full potential?  Ever wonder about dating other people without compromising your current relationship?  Do you think your other half might have roaming eyes or is seeking companionship outside your relationship and want to talk about it? Or are you curious about being with more than one person romantically (not necessarily physically) at the same time?


Well, this group is a safe place to explore and discuss all those possibilities in a healthy and respectable manner! Polyamory is on the rise as people learn to take back their power & choose to be real about what they want in relationships vs going about it secretly. I am a happily married polyamory advocate with 9 years of experience. It truly has been a rewarding journey & I want to share my wisdom with women who might be in the same polycurious boat I found myself in years ago. 

We'll watch poly centered shows/movies & have group discussions. For those brave-hearts I will conduct "mock experiments" to help you take that first step towards the poly lifestyle. These will be staged experiences in a safe environment just to help you learn to open up the communication about what you want. Hopefully you will be brave enough to come out to your significant other or you will learn to find the right people to support your goals to have a polyamorous lifestyle. Why live a secret life when you can jump into a world of people that would embrace you? If nothing else, you owe yourself honesty, acceptance & love!
results.name: Women's Polyamory Project

The internet is changing rapidly which makes it difficult to know "what's working now". The presentations will be focusing on real scenarios and battle tested solutions.

This Meetup is:

Come join us to learn and share!

topics.name: Getting Started as a Real Estate Investor

results.description:
Metro Real Estate Investors Association

“Dedicated to the art of real estate investing and helping our members achieve success”

Real Estate is the greatest wealth builder in the United States, particularly for most people starting out with little cash to invest.

Are you serious about getting a solid real estate education and how to make long-term steady profits in real estate?

Then consider the Metro Real Estate Investors Association. (MREIA)

We are the oldest real estate investing association in New Jersey, originally founded in 1982! MREIA is a volunteer-run association whose officers dedicate their time and effort to helping members achieve their investing goals.

Networking (sharing information, investing tips, etc.) is the heart and soul of a successful Real Estate Investing Association and MREIA has members who have been with us 25-30 years.

No matter what level you are at from beginner to experienced, whether you have yet to buy your first investment property or own dozens of properties,… MREIA is for you!

Please do not get ripped off by spending anywhere from $5,000 to $25,000 for so called ”real estate education and mentoring.. Our annual membership is $150 and all day weekend classes and workshops are $29 - $99.

Our monthly meetings (3rd Monday of the month) are chock full of solid real estate investing education from full time investors and specialists in their fields  (not full time “gurus” hawking the newest “get rich quick” scheme”).

Below are just some of the topics explored at our meetings:

*Creating Positive Cash Flow!

  *Wholesaling!

  *Foreclosures!

  *Options!

  *Rehabbing for Fun and Profit!

   *Finding and Structuring Deals!

  *Selling for Maximum Profit!

  *REO Properties and Short Sales!

  *Negotiating Strategies!

  *Using Private Financing!

Please visit our website at  www.mreia.com. to find out how membership in MREIA can help you realize your dream of financial independence through real estate investing

Members receive our monthly e- newsletter “The Metro.” Each issue contains 25-28 articles on important real estate topics, info on upcoming meetings, and things you need to know such as upcoming legislation that will impact the world of real estate investing.

Please visit our website at  www.mreia.com. to find out how membership in MREIA can help you realize your dream of financial independence through real estate investing

Feel free to call Dan (MREIA President) at 201-791-4639 if you have any questions after visiting www.mreia.com

We hope to see you at our next meeting!
results.name: Metro Real Estate Investors Association

results.description:
As the world changed, we focused on our careers in our early years, putting off marriage and putting off children. Now that we're approaching our 40s and 50s, there is pressure to find a partner. As an alternative to rushed marriages often ending in failed marriages, this Meetup attempts to helps you find a co-parenting partner or find resources to find you a co-parenting partner.

Please note that most of our meetings may also be attended via video through Google hangouts, if you can't make it in person.

results.description:
Who should Join:   Smart, savvy, ambitious women to improve their communication skills and voice in todays in the workplace in order to bring their careers to the next level.   We think getting ambitious women in a room together talking, and learning new skills we can build a community to  create positive change in the paradigm of what "works" in communication.    This is an 18+ event. 

  Vital Voice Jam Sessions are quick and dirty hour long sessions to work on specific skill sets dealing with communication, networking, and getting your voice heard. Our workshops aim to be as fun as they are informative.   

Jam Sessions have come out of a desire to start to tackle some of the more specific concerns our clients come to us with:  How to give an elevator pitch, Networking for Introverts, Negotiation, Interview Skills, Dealing with interruptions, Pitching Important Ideas.  While these are big issues that will certainly not be fully resolved in an hour, we can get you started in thinking about them in a different way- and give you a few tools to add to your tool bag.    

1st Session will be Art of the Elevator Pitch (Nov. 18th, 6:30-7:30 pm. Location: Manhattan). Learn to articulate your value and values with ease, savvy, and style. Our attention spans are shorter. Our lives are busier. And our mental hard drives are at capacity. So when you only have 30 seconds to make an impact, you need to be sure of both what to say and how to say it. The “elevator pitch” can feel outdated, phony, and utterly cringe-inducing . . . but it doesn't have to be. A well crafted elevator pitch can bring out your inner rock star, give people a sense of what you're about (beyond what you "do" -and begin genuine connections. New York-based voice and speech coaches Casey Erin Clark and Julie Fogh of Vital Voice Training will give you the principles to construct and refine a compelling elevator pitch AND show you how to deliver it in a way that truly lands and connects with your audience. Workshop participants will be able to get on your feet, practice, and start to make some connections with other professionals. Post packet PDF included. Cost: $35
results.name: Vital Voice Jam Sessions:  The Art of the Elevator Pitch

results.description:
Welcome BigFoots!

This meetup has been formed to discuss customer use cases and design patterns related to Apache Apex, a next generation native Hadoop big data platform. We hope to build a community that meets face to face in New York for folks interested in Apache Apex.

Apex unifies stream and batch processing. Use cases include ingestion, fast real-time analytics, data movement, disastor recovery in Hadoop, ETL, fast batch, alerts and real-time actions. Apex is a Hadoop-native YARN implementation. It simplifies development and productization of Hadoop applications by reducing time to market. Key features include Enterprise Grade Operability with Fault Tolerance, State Management, Event Processing Guarantees, No Data Loss, High Performance, Linear Scalability. Apache Apex enables users to run any user defined code natively in Hadoop. Apache Apex comes will deep versioned webservice and metrics for system and application monitoring. Additionally Apache Apex includes Apache Apex Malhar library of reusable operators (functions). Examples of connectors include the following

• Messaging Systems: ActiveMQ, Flume, JMS, Kafka, Kinesis Streams, MapR Streams, Nifi, RabbitMQ, Solace, ZeroMQ, etc.

• File Systems: HDFS, NFS, S3, etc.

• Databases/Stores: Accumulo, AeroSpike, Cassandra, CouchDb, MongoDB, HBase, Couchbase, Geode, HBase, Hive Tables, Impala, JDBC, HP Vertica, MemCache, MemSql, MySql, Oracle, Redis,  etc.

• Protocols: AMPQ, HTTP, FTP/SFTP, MQTT, SMTP, Rest/Soap, Twitter, Websockets, etc.

• Other Systems: Elastic Search, Solr, Twitter, etc. 

We want to develop a strong community that meets face to face and has a deep influence on big data ecosystem. If you are interested in presenting at this meet-up, please email to apex-meetup@datatorrent.com. 

Apache Apex Community Organizer
results.name: Apache Apex (native Hadoop), New York Chapter

results.description:
This group is all about building a positive relationship and bond with your dog through science based training and benevolent leadership with fun activities and events. We host monthly meetings so that you can work on your dog's loose leash walking, socialization, and/or reactivity challenges in a relaxed environment and with guidance from the organizer or other members of meetup group. We are here to have fun and make every experience with our dogs a mutually enjoyable one for both handler and dog. We are offering some basic obedience classes as well. The bulk of the classes are related to helping your dog attain the skills necessary to achieve Canine Good Citizen, an AKC-recognized title. The skills of CGC should be something every dog owner strives for. We offer all CGC classes as small classes so that you get personal attention and help during each class. We offer free training classes for foster dogs of rescue groups and shelters as we strive to be a community training resource for the homeless animals. We ask as a member that you promise to: 

1. Be loyal to the absent and treat one another with kindness. We have no patience for drama or pettiness. 

2. Breed discrimination is not tolerated. We love all dogs, big and small. 

3. Class sizes are limited! If you RSVP, please honor it. 

4. Always bring: Water, potty bags, high-value treats or toy items, and always bring a good attitude 

5. Respect of other dog/handler teams is a must. Your dog should only meet other dogs when invited to do so by its handler. Please ask before you assume! 

6. No retractable leashes. 

7. One dog per handler for most events. If you would like special consideration, please email the organizer. 

8. Please keep dogs that are in training in collars or harnesses they cannot escape from. The absolute worst thing would be to lose a dog at an event. Please be patient as this group develops and grows.


If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions, please let me know. 

This meet up is open for all dog lovers (you don't have to have a dog), owners, adopters, rescuers, volunteers, who are seeking the balanced relationship between dogs and human, raising the awareness of the importance of dog training and responsible dog ownership.  

The meet up events include but not limited to: Dog Obedience Training; Dog Agility Training; Dog Rehabilitation; Off-leash adventures; Skijoring; BikeJoring; etc 

Locations of the meetups -Staten Island South Beach Area. When joining this Meetup group, please post a picture of your dog as your profile picture. 

Meet Up group are safe, therefore, everyone must keep their dogs up to date with all vaccinations and only join the pack if there is no history of uncontrollable aggressive behavior. By joining the group, you agree to release the groups organizer and members from any and all liability with regard to group activities. You are responsible for your dog at all events and agree to keep your dog under control.
results.name: Staten Island Active Dogs Meet-up

results.description:
We meet each Saturday (11:30am) at the East Rutherford Memorial Library (143 Boiling Springs Ave, East Rutherford, NJ 07073) to meditate and experience the innate connection we have with each other and the energy that created us.

All across the globe, everyone is seeking new sources of energy. Meanwhile, the most transformative energy of all is hiding in plain sight. It's natural, sustainable, and infinitely renewable. It's called Inner Energy. And everyone already has it — including you. Become balanced and better connected to yourself — emotionally, physically, and spiritually. If you're having trouble juggling the challenges in your life, Sahaja Yoga Meditation can help you manage stress, master your emotions and find solutions to your problems. You'll enjoy better health, better focus, and a deeper understanding of the universe and your place in it. Sahaja Yoga Meditation is much more than feeling peaceful and relaxed. Within each of us are layers, varied and deep. Explore at your own pace, in your own way. And our experts are always available to help. Ready to plug into your inner energy? A few minutes of Sahaja Yoga Meditation every day may be all it takes to connect to your inner energy (called kundalini in the yogic tradition) and light the path to lifelong transformation. Sahaja is more than a temporary solution or quick relief; it's a journey to complete fulfillment. All classes are free. Everyone is welcome. Bring a friend, bring your kids — we welcome all ages. 

Unlike other forms of meditation or yoga, this is not something you "do" - it is more about a state of becoming, of "being" rather than doing, a living process that transforms your life from within.

For more, visit www.sahajameditation.com. Sahaja Yoga Meditation is a not-for-profit offering free spiritual meditation guidance in more than 100 countries worldwide.
results.name: East Rutherford Sahaja Yoga Meditation

results.description: "The Inventors Road Show™" is presented by award winning inventor Andrea Rose.  Andrea and her team of  notable experts both educate and empower those who either have an idea for an invention or already have a patent and who  want to  bring their "Idea to Industry™.  During the workshops Andrea will be looking for those "Winning" products to introduce to her marketing alliances  which include such companies as   "As Seen On TV", mass retailers, catalogs etc.  "The Inventors Road Show™" is excited to announce we have teamed up with HSN !!  During each workshop the attendees can participate in "Pitch A Product™ " where they have a specific amount of time to present their invention to the group.  Examples of workshop topics: * How to protect your idea. * How to file for a patent *How to reduce costs in getting your "Idea to Industry". * Discovering the type of inventor you are. * How to market your idea/invention and create your own brand identity. * Building your support network to succeed. * How to raise capital in your industry. * Learning how to maintain a positive mental attitude.....against all odds.  We welcome your suggestions for topics you would like our workshops to present. We look forward to you attending our workshops.   Andrea Rose has a  private consulting business for inventors. If you would like to  schedule a private  one-on-one consultation email her at:  andrea@andrearoseinventions.com

results.description:
ARTEMIS is a social/activity group for adult women of any age (18 and older*) living in the New York City area (or greater metro area) who have either been formally or self-diagnosed with some form of autism -- whether aspergers, autism or related diagnoses. The group is organized by a woman with self-diagnosed aspergers in her early 30s (not a mental health professional) and is not affiliated with any organizations.

THIS IS NOT A GROUP FOR PARENTS OF AUTISTIC CHILDREN unless of course they themselves are on the spectrum.

Connect with other women with similar backgrounds and communication styles through get-togethers, creative expression workshops, visits to museums and other cool places around the city, and whatever other activities that the group would be interested in doing -- I would love to have people suggest things they'd like to do in the future and help to plan events or happenings if they are interested in doing so.

ARTEMIS aims to be a non-judgemental, drama-free zone where women can feel safe just being themselves and relax with other ladies who "get it" with the eventual goal of building a small group of friends. I will aim to plan a meet-up once a month and the meetups will be mostly in manhattan and occasionally in one of the boroughs if we decide to go somewhere there.

This group is an LGBTQ safe space, meaning, among other things, trans women and genderqueer individuals who identify with the female experience are entirely welcome. If this makes you uncomfortable, please do not join.


Please read the group ground rules before joining by clicking on "Pages" and looking at the "Group Ground Rules" page before joining the group.

**This Just In: I've started a Secret Facebook group for ARTEMIS (a private group that won't show up in a search, only members can see who's in it, and has no direct link), so that we can get to know each other a bit more and have another platform for sharing resources and ideas for future meetups! If you would like to join that group, please join this group first and then send me a message asking to join the Facebook group and I will make it happen.**

Read and learn more about autism in women by clicking on "Pages" and looking at the Resources page.

*if you are younger than 18, you can also join the group but please message me first.
results.name: ARTEMIS - Community for Women of the Autism Spectrum in NYC

We're a tightly knit group of motivated study buddies who are targeting 700+ scores and top 10 B-schools and who are already reasonably familiar with GMAT structure and content. 

The group philosophy is that small study groups whose members have similar goals and skill-levels are effective and efficient, allowing for fast-paced, targeted learning.

A bit of background about me: I graduated from Cornell University in 2014 and finished a top-rated test preparation program. I have scheduled my first (and hopefully last) exam for March 2016.

We meet around Midtown (coffee shops near GCT or the Cornell Club) at nights on weekdays and weekends. 

If you're interested in joining, you can contact me at gtm33@cornell.edu or message me through this site.

All the best,

Greg

results.description:
Ready to fall in love? 

To have the crazy, sexy, passionate relationship you’ve always fantasized about? 

You’ve joined the right group.

Since you’re here, I can only figure that putting yourself out there isn’t the challenge.

Do you keep attracting the same relationship, only with a different person?

Or maybe you go on a lot of lackluster dates?

Or have trouble getting past date number one?

I get it. Trust me, I’ve been there. This group exists to shift that paradigm, and to have fun while doing it!

So what are we going to do together?

We’re going to connect.

We’re going to travel.

We’re going to grow.

We’re going to get uncomfortable.

We’re going to stretch ourselves and be comforted that everyone else is also out of their comfort zones.

Most importantly we’re going to have fun and meet interesting people, who’s intentions are a little deeper than finding their next date.

Thank you so much for being willing to allow me in on your journey, and I can’t wait to meet you!

~ Danita
results.name: Relationship Ready Singles - New York

results.description:
I am a Life Strategy Coach, I assist people in a multitude of ways. I formed this is a group for people who are looking for ways to balance business life.  In todays environment where people are juggling multiple businesses,  members are given opportunities to learn effective ways to  delegate  and manage work loads. Workshops are also provided to help with goal achieving.

Members will benefit from monthly and sometime weekly workshops that will teach you how to distress, work through business and personal challenges, and make the most of your business and leisure time. workshops will also help people to maximize their potential. you will work on goal attainment, and how to live more purposefully. I assist those who choose to make changes into entrepreneurship, and those who are making life changes from working to retirement, changing positions, and re-entering the work world.

Many activities are in the works for the members of this group. No matter what industry your from, you can join. The idea is to become the best you can be at home and at work, and hopefully we can enjoy a little fun in between!

Business Group Description:

This group is for people who would like to learn how to improve their leadership skills, understand the role of manager/ entrepreneur, social media, the importance of purposeful networking, public speaking, creating a positive image, balancing multiple projects, and balancing the roles of entrepreneur and employee.

Since I am a Life Strategy Coach, I work with people who juggle the roles of entrepreneur and employee, as well as those who desire to work their way up the management ladder. 

This group is productive for people who are re-entering the work world, and those who are considering retiring but are still active and would like to consider retirement as another phase of their life plan.

Workshops planned will include:

Managing Stress in the workplace

Public Speaking

Dressing for Success

Purposeful Networking

Perfecting Elevator Speech

Creating your 5 year plan

Working with Social Media

Balancing work/business/home

Also:

Monthly social activities to Meetup with members and introduce potential new members.

topics.name: Improve your Life, Looks and Finances

results.description:
This NYC Make Peace with Cash Flows Meetup group might be ideal for you if you are interested in developing peace with your current personal cash flows and professional networking.  Even if you are in a good place with your current situation, here is a good opportunity to optimize for the future while also helping others. This group was formed as my life was growing in different areas, and it took time for me to be at peace while being on the same page with my loved ones. Once I found that peace and meaning in my life, I felt the need to pay it forward.  It is great to know where you want to go by having goals and while savings and investments are certainly important, they are not everything.  Now let’s take it a step further and gain some peace of mind by getting totally clear about our current personal cash flows.  Let's do this without having destination disease - curious about what that is? Show up and learn how to move past that phase.

Let's be present in the movement and transparent about our future actions.  Let’s be proactive, be the catalyst to change and always be prepared to react to the new unforseen events that affect our lives.  Let's build with like-minded people that are thinking clear and concisely about their current cash flows.


We will then continue by disecting some case studies of life situations that might cause one to lose that said peace of mind and then best practices on how to move forward with a safe and sound mindset.  While we go through our presentation, we will discuss hidden current costs that can effect your current monetary situations.  We will also be sharing solutions to create a sanctuary in ourselves by getting clear on our cash flow realities. We suggest you share issues and solutions throughout the process. We always make sure to leave at least 15 to 30mins for networking encouragement and questions.
results.name: NYC Peace with Cash flows Meetup

results.description:
Who we are: Brooklyn Wallyball club has called Eastern Athletic Club (EAC) it's home since 1981.  In that time it has become the undisputed all time winningest Wallyball program anywhere in the country  with more than 70 National titles at all levels in all divisions. 

If you are either an Open or Advanced level Volleyball/Wallyball  player we encourage you to join this meetup and come join us for a great and competitive Wallyball game. 

Location: Eastern Athletic Club (EAC)  43 Clark St. Brooklyn,N.Y.   Closest Subway is the Clark Street station on the 2/3 line

Time:  Every SUNDAY 3pm -7pm

We will assess your basic Volleyball skills when you first join to determine the most appropriate division for you to play in.  We reserve the right to deny anyone membership that does not possess the minimum basic skills required in order to ensure the safety and enjoyment of all members. 

Divisions:  Men's, Women and Co-ed Triples and doubles at the advanced and open levels

Membership: Membership is for the entire season only, which runs from November 1st 2015 through May 1st, 2016.   Membership fee is $220 which covers access to EAC and the court fees during the allotted Wallyball time.   This membership fee is NOT prorated  so the best value is to come as early in the season as possible.

To encourge you to check the game out before you sign up, notify our leadership team about what day you wish to come and special arrangements with the facility will be made to provide a ONE-TIME ONLY complimentary admission  to play.  


Videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73g_9a9tieg...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=36-sJ5JISwA

This Organization's soul purpose is to help and inspire creatives PAVE THEIR OWN WAY. Each and every event and meetup will be one of value to help uplift independent creatives. There will be motivational speakers, thought leaders, trainings, networking events and many other helpful resources to come! The bigger we make this the more we can do for each other!

(My name is Maribel aka Bella, a creative of many lanes born and raised in New York. As a creative but first and foremost a person I've been disillusioned and overwhelmed by disappointments, distractions, con artist, financial hardships, non-believers, and false inadequacies forced upon me. I’m sure that sounds and feels familiar to a lot of you... So let me tell you what I’ve learned: That you don’t need anyone’s approval to be great, that you belong wherever you go and want to be, that sharing knowledge and helping others will always benefit you and that you don’t need an ivy league education, all you need is your talent, drive, and ideally some support. (We do our selves and others an injustice in holding back. Join me in not doing that anymore)

results.description:
The mission of the Israeli-American Council (IAC) is to build an engaged and united Israeli-American community that strengthens our next generations, the American Jewish community and the State of Israel.

Over half a million Israeli-Americans live in the United States today. As a vital component of American society, they play a major role in social activism, academia, culture and innovation. The Israeli-American Council (IAC) is the largest Israeli-American organization in the United States, serving this vibrant sector of American society. The IAC’s effectiveness and success is the direct result of its ability to organize, activate, and engage the Israeli-American community nationwide. The IAC strives to achieve these goals through programs and events for all ages, as well as by empowering and sponsoring a wide array of non-profit organizations within the Israeli-American community.

This is a group for all the Israeli American's out there in New Jersey. Where we can share meetings and initiatives, ideas and events.
results.name: Israeli American Council (IAC) in New Jersey

results.description:
Does TensorFlow have the potential to become the engine behind most successful consumer and industrial products of the next 10-20 years? 

Absolutely! A much better question is how, and in what new ways, can we:

a) train more computers to teach themselves by sifting through massive amounts of data coming out of all sorts of places

b) make these computers available through an API to provide a high-quality answer to anyone who is in need. 

Why? Because everyone in need deserves the right answer. 

So.... why don't we standardize & democratize the field with and around TensorFlow, and help change the world!?

What. We are a local micro community of those interested in advancing their knowledge of TensorFlow, its use cases and applications.

How. Join our group for a regular dose of human interaction, conversations, smiles, food and drinks on all things TensorFlow:

• How-To's & Best Practices

• Tutorials

• Models

• Algorithms

• Multi-GPU Autoscaling in the cloud

• Tools & Integrations

We will learn how others solve some of the hard problems that exist in the world around us, and how others make predictive APIs and applications.

Join the movement. Let’s change the world. Because everyone in need deserves the right answer.

You are welcome:)
results.name: TensorFlow New York City

results.description:
This is a group for anyone in their 20's, 30's or 40's who supports the mission of Project Music (see below). The group will provide an opportunity to meet like-minded people, socialize and network - all while contributing to a fantastic cause. We will have happy hours, live music events, fundraising drives, and chances to witness the amazing positive influence the program has on its students. 

Project Music is a free intensive after-school music education program for students in Stamford, Connecticut. The program is inspired by Venezuela’s “music education miracle” known as El Sistema, a program for social change created over 30 years ago. PROJECT MUSIC provides music education, instruments, and mentorship to Stamford youngsters. PROJECT MUSIC is intended not only to provide musical instruments and training, but also to address some of the extensive social challenges affecting Stamford’s youth. To this end, we use music to cultivate fundamental life skills such as self-expression, cooperative learning, discipline, leadership, and creativity— all of which have been linked to improved social and academic outcomes. The program fills a gap in accessible quality music education and after­-school care in the City of Stamford.
results.name: Project Music - Young Leadership Committee - Stamford

results.description:
We want to build a community for current and prospective Udacity students of all Nanodegree programs to gather together and advance their education. 

Our mission is to bring accessible, affordable, engaging, and highly effective higher education to the world. We believe that higher education is a basic human right, and we seek to empower our students to advance their education and careers. Education is no longer a one-time event but a lifelong experience. Education should be less passive listening (no long lectures) and more active doing. Education should empower students to succeed not just in school but in life.

We gather a few times a month to work through course content as well as host interesting events such as speaker series and hack-a-thons that take learning beyond the virtual classroom. Can't wait to see you soon!

The Udacity NYC Meetup is a flat organization, meaning we are not a "top-down" hierarchy. Members should feel free to suggest Meetup topics and events. Members who consistently demonstrate their dedication to the group may be given some moderator powers, which include the ability to create and host events.

"Dude, remember the golden rule - be excellent to each other.' Bill & Ted
results.name: Udacity NYC Meetup

results.description:
We are a community of people for whom just drinking wine is not enough. We have all levels of experience and while not in the industry, always look for opportunities to learn about wine. 

One Friday a month, we hire a wine educator to pick out wines and take us through a tasting based on a topic of our choosing. Generally, we do one round of tasting without food and then we go back to our favorites while socializing over snacks. The idea of this gathering is to learn the basics of tasting while going through different wine regions and styles throughout the world. 

Occasionally we have field trips to different wine bars or wine centric places in NYC (Manhattan or Brooklyn) to do tastings there. These are less formal than our monthly tastings and let us learn about the different people, places, and perspectives through NYC.

In terms of cost, Wine Club members split the cost of all events. Non-restaurant events are usually hosted in one of our apartments - typically in Brooklyn by the Barclays Center but any member can offer to host.
results.name: NYC Wine Club Meetup

results.description:
Superbrain Yoga® is a simple and effective technique to energize and recharge the brain. It is based on the principles of subtle energy and ear acupuncture. This powerful technique is explained in Master Choa Kok Sui's latest book Superbrain Yoga®. 
A US news story Superbrain Yoga can now be viewed on You Tube click here

Pilot studies on the effects of Superbrain Yoga® on school children include children with disabilities such as ADHD/ADD, developmental and cognitive delays, Down syndrome and specific learning disabilities. Children studied showed significant increase in academic and behavioral performance, greater class participation and improved social skills. In one study, the result of an electroencephalograph showed increased amplitude in the parieto-occipital region of the brain following the Superbrain Yoga®. This indicates increased brain electrical activity following the exercise. More studies on the effects of Superbrain Yoga®are being conducted.
results.name: MCKS Super Brain Yoga

results.description:
This group is for digital product designers who are interested in exploring the experience between physical and digital space. How can we bring the same design thinking we do for digital products into the physical space? How can we make the everyday apps we already use more interesting with in-real-life touch points? How might we create in-real-life buttons that create digital trails? This is a group for product designers, experimenters and people interested in the intersection between physical and digital things to come together and prototype ideas quickly. We'll host workshops around design challenges so you can make time for experimentation and play outside of work. Design challenges we might try:

• Create something that fixes an annoying problem you face every day.
• Create something that makes your favorite app come to life.
• Create something that makes people laugh
• Create something to help strangers start talking to each other.
• Create something that replaces the last thing you threw away yesterday.

We’ll use kits from LittleBits™— inputs like the Button, Motion Trigger and slide dimmer, connect with the CloudBit and IFTTT to make your offline buttons come to life. 

What is LittleBits™?

littleBits is a platform of easy-to-use electronic building blocks that empower you to invent anything, from your own remote controlled car, to a smart home device. The Bits snap together with magnets, no soldering, no wiring, no programming needed.

Meetups will be held at the LittleBits™ pop-up store in SoHo.
results.name: NYC Makers Meetup

results.description:
Do you look at the mirror often and obsess about a flaw? Do you think when you go out everyone is shunning you because of a specific "flaw?"Does your low self-esteem hinder you from engaging in normal social activities? Do you feel stressed at the notion of having to mingle at a birthday or holiday party?  I suffer from these types of insecurities, stresses, and obsessions and wanted to start a group where people who have BDD (Body Dysmorphic Disorder) & Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD) can get support by talking things through. I have been diagnosed with BDD and have isolated myself from many facets of life for the last few years. I have a dread that someone in public will comment on my flaws. 

I am starting this group with no lofty ambition other then to connect those who feel that they have become imprisoned by low self-esteem, social anxiety, and distorted body/face image. Perhaps through sharing our stories we can heal and feel less alone.  If you would like to come to a meetup please tell me a little about yourself. I am also starting this meetup because there were no other BDD support groups I could find locally.

results.description:
This is a group for people who would like to get up early on Sunday mornings to talk about great books over some coffee or tea with like-minded fellow New Yorkers. 

When and where to meet? 

-- Meeting twice a month, at a cafe or restaurant in Manhattan, on Sunday mornings. The core discussion time is from 8:30 - 9:30 am. The social time, which is optional, is 30 minutes before and after the discussion time. (I.E., 8:00 - 8:30 am and 9:30 -10:00 am). You can use the social time to eat breakfast, brunch or just chat. 

How the books and meeting locations are chosen? 

-- Anyone who volunteers to be a facilitator of a meeting has the right to choose the book to discuss for that meeting and the exact location to meet. 

As a suggestion,  we can choose the books from the following list: 

1. Self-improvement books in bestseller lists

2. Winners of Pulitzer Prize in Biography or Autobiography Categoryhttp://www.pulitzer.org/bycat/Biography-or-Autobiography

3. Oprah's Book Club list http://static.oprah.com/pdf/obc-complete-list.pdf 

4. All-Time 100 Novels (chosen by Time Magazine) http://entertainment.time.com/2005/10/16/all-time-100-nov... 

5. Classics


Please be noted that 

--- the meeting may be cancelled if there are less than 3 RVSPs;

--- anyone with a "no show" of two times will be blocked from the group.
results.name: Early Risers' Book Club

results.description:
Welcome to the meetup page for New York City chapter of National Women's Liberation. National Women's Liberation (NWL) is a new feminist group with old roots. The organization was born from a collaboration between organizers from Redstockings and Gainesville Women's Liberation (FL) which started in 1968. We are a dynamic and diverse group of women in the fight against male supremacy, developing theory alongside our actions. An integral part of our organization is the Women of Color Caucus (WOCC) which meets separately from white women to better understand how white supremacy intersects with other forms of oppression. Our group hosts public meetings the third Tuesday of every month at The Commons at 388 Atlantic Ave, and all women are welcome.

NWL won a big victory in 2013 when the Morning-After Pill was put over the counter for all ages, the fruits of a 10-year battle that included a sit-in at the FDA, illegally giving out the pill to show the ridiculousness of the restrictions, and a class action lawsuit. Current priorities are the right to abortion and birth control and the overthrow of the double day--women's roles as full-time caretakers and full time employees. Most recently, we printed and distributed 1969 "This Oppresses Women" stickers after reviving them from the Redstockings Archive. We got a lot of publicity when they were used against Protein World's Beach Body ads in Union Square, and they continue to appear on other offending ads all over the city. NWL feminists are also organizing the #ShoutYourAbortion campaign in NYC.

We are a group for women who want to fight back against male supremacy and win more freedom for women. We believe that change comes about from the actions of everyday people—not politicians, the courts, lobbyists, or the media. The freedoms we have now were won by movements of women, organizing and fighting for change. Men did not become less sexist or decide to give women the vote or legalize birth control because of our individual abilities to reason with them, educate them, or because they love us so much. The inequalities between women and men are political problems that require a collective solution.


Check out womensliberation.org to get involved.

Unless specifically noted, all events are for women only. Thank you!
results.name: National Women's Liberation: Feminist Activism NYC

results.description:
Stacki NYC is a meetup for those interested in learning about Stacki, server provisioning, configuration management, and DevOps while meeting others in their area who share the same interests.  This group is for everyone- both Stacki users and beginners to Stacki- you don't need to have any prior experience!

Stacki is an open source CentOS/RHEL bare metal provisioning tool that can take your servers from bare hardware (or virtual hardware) to working Linux, ready to install applications. Stacki does this at scale, so deploying 1000+ servers is no more complex than deploying one. Once your servers are installed with Stacki, you can augment them with configuration tools like Puppet, Chef, Salt, CFEngine, Ansible, etc. 

Join the Stacki community: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/stacki

Download Stacki: http://www.stacki.com/

Stacki documentation: https://github.com/StackIQ/stacki/wiki

Follow Stacki on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Stacki
results.name: Stacki NYC

results.description:
Come out and Meetup with like-minded individuals ready to serve communities locally and abroad while challenging themselves and growing in faith and fellowship.

Christian Adventure Missions
You’ll Know What To Do When You Get There
Transformational Spiritual and Life Changing Trip For Christians. Zmission experiences awaken your mind and inspire your soul while creating profound and lasting spiritual changes in your life.

Much More Than A Trip
Take an adventure trip that will not only help to transform you but also make a difference in the local community.

Where God’s Taking You
Is god calling you to make a difference in the world? To serve something greater than yourself? Whether he has been tapping you on the shoulder for years or has recently showed up in your life we are here TO SERVE. We are all called TO SERVE… Are you ready?
If you choose to serve, to disciple, to seek wise council, and to share fellowship with other Christians experiencing the grace of god through purpose-driven adventure missions trips then Zmissions is for you.

Travel With Purpose and Impact
Zmissions adventures are long, hard, and sometimes painful, but also transformational, rewarding, and fun. They will bring you much joy and fulfillment. You will continue to push your limits long after the trip is over, knowing “JESUS CHRIST MY LORD AND GOD IN YOU I PUT MY TRUST” Through all the chaos, adventure, and unconditional love, you find what has been missing in your life. These experiences will absolutely transform your life and outlook, but most importantly by putting your faith in Jesus, and believing he can provide everything and more, you will experience a level of living a life that many only dream about.

Feel the Power of God
Feeling the power of God through Discipleship and Fellowship. This became apparent during our first Zmission. It was truly a humbling and eye-opening experience. As we sat together in fellowship after traveling thousands of miles, we realized that we were there to Serve in any way needed and without judgment. Guidance came in the form of wise council trusting in God and seeking his word. To feel the power of God, let go and trust in him and your life will be transformed. Jesus shows up in our lives in powerful ways and guides us along our journeys

What We Can Do to Serve
There are many ways TO SERVE communities around the world and gives new found hope to people who may not have had hope before through Christ. This means bringing groups together to transform lives and opening minds to new realities by embodying the unconditional love of Jesus. It also means we are never above the communities and individuals we serve. No task is to small. We will serve around the world where there is need and you will impact the world in a positive way while making a difference in thousands of people lives along the way.

You’ll Know What To Do When You Get There
Where God leads you next, and the blessings he will bestow will absolutely blow your mind. Where ever we go, what ever we do, when we get there we do what is needed Period. All you have to do is show up and the big man above will handle the rest. What will you do next? Did you feel it? Will you answer the call to SERVE.

Zmissions Team
Jon Christian – Mission Leader

God began taping me on the shoulder at an early age. I remember it like it was yesterday. I”d always been naturally rebellious and found it hard to accept what was taught at Sunday school. Sound Familiar? At the age of about 7, I realized there was something missing while sitting in Church services. I felt like God had a bigger plan. A plan for me to SERVE!

Years passed while my searched continued for connection, purpose, and impact until the day my perspective was changed forever… at my feet written as clear as the day was…”JESUS IS THE WAY”. That was the day I was CALLED SERVE.

I found myself standing on the farthest rock in the ocean I could find. I’d been traveling for miles with 50 lbs. of gear and had not seen my family in two months. As the sun began to set the sky had lit up like fire. The contrast between the blue ocean and the sky was unlike anything I have ever seen before. It was as if God himself was staring back at me looking deep within my soul. My hair began to stand up the same way it had when I found “JESUS IS THE WAY” written in concrete so many years before. A voice from within, not the voice you hear from internal conversations you have in your head on a normal day, this was all encompassing vibrating energy coming from both outside and within, it was coming from my heart and the entire world around me. The words spoken to me were “WELL DONE, YOU MADE IT…NOW GO AND TELL THE WORLD.

The adventures and the journey are long, hard, and sometimes painful, but also transformational, rewarding, and have brought much joy and fulfillment in my life. I continue to push my limits, praying “JESUS CHRIST MY LORD AND GOD IN YOU I PUT MY TRUST” Through all the chaos and adventure, and a chance meeting with my Guardian Angel who taught me what unconditional love is I had found what I had been looking for since the age of 7. These experiences have absolutely transformed my life and outlook but most importantly by putting my faith in Jesus and believing he could provide everything and more that we needed I experienced a level of living a life that many only dream about.

Where God lead me next, and the blessings he bestowed on me to this day absolutely blow my mind. Where ever we go, what ever we do, when we get there we do what is needed Period. All you have to do is show up and the big man above will handle the rest. What will you do next? Did you feel it? Will you answer the call to SERVE.

After a long and sometimes lonely journey, I’ve found wise counsel and fellowship in Christ. Now it’s your turn, we climb this mountain and embark on the adventure together.

John Albino – Mission Leader

John Albino started Absolute Music Studios with one goal in mind… to create a warm and inviting musical atmosphere that he himself would want to come to. It all started with the desire to live a more community-oriented life and to be around to raise his children instead of living on the road, which he did for many years. John has worked with musicians from many of the biggest names in the music business over the years, including KISS, The Pretenders, Wings, Billy Joel, Foreigner, Pat Travers and Quiet Riot, to name a few.

He has also worked as a studio musician, playing on sessions with many top producers including Stephen Gelfas and Charlie Midnight.
Now he has created a first class music studio staffed with the best player-teachers in the area. He brings decades of musical expertise and the benefit of years of front-line professional experience to Absolute Music, his own unique creation. Using that experience as a musician and a vision to guide him, he set out to build a studio where many could come and pursue their passion for music in a warm and inviting family-oriented atmosphere, while being taught by the finest teachers available. Absolute Music is now firmly established as one of the best and busiest music lesson studios in the area. John’s continual dedication to and involvement with the surrounding communities plays a crucial role in his success, while also providing community enrichment through music.

results.description: This group provides a safe space to explore how yoga and mindfulness can help make a difference in your life, reduce stress, start living in the present moment and lead to better self-care. I am Diana S. Ramos, a Registered Dietitian/Nutritionist and yoga instructor. I practice a mind-body approach to nutrition and well-being, and empower each individual to develop a healthy relationship with their bodies, mind and food. My mission is to help individuals thrive into a more joyful, healthy and mindful lives. I discovered the real benefits of yoga in the most difficult times in my life. I was at my peak levels of stress, anxiety and unhappiness. Yoga helped me find peace within myself. Through the practice of yoga I discovered that stress, anxiety and unhappiness were rooted from not living and accepting the present moment. I noticed I was either in living in the past or worrying about the future, but never present moment, in what is. Yoga helped me to kindly move into the present moment, decrease self-judgement, and cultivate self-compassion, self-love and self-acceptance. I would like to share this experience and practice with you. This group offers yoga and wellness workshops, to help you dive into the present moment, release stress and anxiety, and help you to compassionately take care of you. Allow yoga to help you connect with your body. Yoga is not about how flexible you are but how flexible you can become on your mat and in real life with you and your thoughts. Yoga is not about competing, comparing, or judging, it is about self-acceptance, self-love and self-compassion. Yoga is a practice where no experience necessary. The only requirement is you and an open mind. This is an invitation to take care of your body and mind. My Motto: Embrace. Love. Nurture. Embrace who you are. Love yourself just as you are. In order to Nurture yourself the right way.
results.name: Nourish Body & Mind

Cheers,
WorldChoiceModels

Sandstorm is an open source operating system for personal and private clouds. Sandstorm is the easiest way you've ever seen to run Google Drive alternative web apps like Etherpad, Davros, SandForms, Hacker Slides, and Etherpad on your own server. We also have other great web apps like Gitlab, Rocket.Chat, WordPress, and Wekan on our App Market.

Meet Sandstorm's core developers as well as users, app developers, and people who are excited to run Sandstorm for themselves or for their company. We'll learn from each other, share info about apps we like and apps we wrote, and have conversations about where Sandstorm should go next. Please join us! 

For more information about Sandstorm:

Join us at our monthly Shamanic Circle, in Northern, NJ, where we learn about and experience the beauty and magick of Shamanism through Journey work. Journeying is a core element of the shamanic practice that is attained through drumming. It opens the doors to other realms of consciousness and altered states of being. This allows us to connect and work with guides and helpers and to receive messages/direction and/or to access deep states of healing with intention. 

Whether it is your first time or you are familiar with journeying, you are welcome to join! This is a safe and sacred space where all paths are welcome.  

Bring a notebook and pen to document your experience, bandana/eye cover, sacred item(s) to put on the altar, and hand-held instruments. Wear comfortable clothing.

RSVP/More Info ~ Cristina Maria via Meet-up

Cost ~ $20 Adults (over 25 yrs), $5 Young Adults, Teens, and Children (over 10 yrs - 25 yrs) 

This is a reoccurring circle every 3rd Friday of the month ~ Upcoming Circle, Friday, January 15th ~

results.description:
What we are about?

This Meetup group is for people that are willing to meet in the name of Jesus Christ from house to house and in public places. We want to meet at least once a week, to speak of Jesus Christ and the Scriptures, to pray together, to continue in the apostles teachings and in fellowship, and in the breaking of bread.

It is written, there is one who scatters, yet increases more; and there is one who withholds more than is right, but it leads to poverty. This group is to "scatter" the word of God, to give free course to the Scriptures. As long as we are willing to rightly divide the word of truth, every man and woman has a part in the conversation. We can edify each other in love. I put one block of truth, and you can put another block of truth.

You can expect to be part of a spiritual conversation, and the opportunity to exercise your spiritual gifts as long as we do all things decently and in order. When we come together, every single member has. One has a psalm, another a doctrine, someone else a tongue, another one a revelation, the next man an interpretation. Let all things be done for edifying of the body of Christ.

The Gospel

The Gospel of Jesus Christ is the glad tidings of the kingdom of God unto the meek, liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound, the proclamation of the day of salvation, the acceptable year of the Lord (Isa 52:6-7, 61:1-2, Luk 4:18-19, 8:1); whereby God sent and anointed his son Jesus Christ to preach the Gospel and to be the saviour of the world. (1 Jn 4:14) The Gospel of Jesus Christ is the power of God unto salvation to everyone that believes whether Jew or Greek (Rom 1:16-17) to all them that call upon him (Rom 10:12-15). For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith.  The Gospel declares that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures, he was buried, and rose again the third day according to the scriptures, that he was seen of Cephas, the twelve and then of five hundred brethren at once. (1 Cor 15:1-3) Through the Gospel we understand that that the stone which was rejected is become the head of the corner.  Jesus Christ who was rejected and crucified rose again the third day according to the scriptures, and is now exalted far above all principalities and powers (Ps 118:22-23, Mat 21:42, Acts 4:10-12, 1 Cor 15:1-3, Eph 1:20-21). This tried stone is none other than Jesus Christ; whose name is called Wonderful, Counsellor, The Mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace. (Isa 7:10-14, Mat 1:21-23; Is 8:10-18, 9:6-7; 1 Pet 2:4-8). This is the true God and eternal life (1 Jn 5:20).

An essential part of the gospel is understanding what it means that Jesus is the Christ.  It is written, that He whom God has sent speaks the words of God, for God did not give the Spirit by measure unto Him (Jn 3:34). This verse speaks of Jesus of Nazareth, a body that God prepared, so that the fullness of the Father would be manifested in him (Heb 10:5). As the Scripture says, For in him dwelleth all the fullness of the Godhead bodily (Col 1:19).  This is the mystery of Christ, even the mystery of godliness. God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory (1Ti 3:16). He that sees Jesus, sees Him that sent him (Jn 12:45). This is to the mind that has understanding. The name of the Father is Jesus. The name of the Son is Jesus. The name of the Holy Ghost is Jesus. These are spiritual words, and they owe to be discerned spiritually. This is what Jesus meant, when he said that he was the Son of God. For since the very beginning it was written, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness (Gen 1:16). Jesus Christ is that man, he is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature (Col 1:15). God was in Christ, and not another. I repeat again, Christ received the Spirit of God without measure. The prophet Isaiah foresaw this and speaking as the oracles of God wrote that a child will be born unto us, that a son will be given. And that his name shall be called the mighty God, the everlasting Father. We are also called to be partakers of such fullness, to come in the unity of the faith, the knowledge of the Son of God, to grow unto that perfect man, unto the measure and stature of Christ (Eph 4:13). We are also called to receive the Spirit of Christ. God will give us the Holy Ghost if we obey Him (Acts 5:32). Men and brethren, what must we do in order to obey God?

Jesus Christ came preaching repentance and that the kingdom of heaven is at hand (Mat 4:17). In order to enter into the kingdom of God we must be born again of the water and of the Spirit (Jn 3:3-5). Those early disciples in the book of Acts were born again when they repented, were baptized in the name of Jesus Christ (born of the water), and received the infilling of the Holy Ghost (born of the Spirit). (Acts 2:37-41, 8:12-17, 9:17-18, 10:44-48, 19:1-6) The baptisms in the book of Acts were done in the name of Jesus Christ (Acts 2:38, 4:12, 8:12, 10:48, 19:5, Gal 3:27, Rom 6:3-4, Col 2:12). In order to obey the Gospel and enter into the kingdom of God we too must do what those early disciples did and what Jesus commanded. Repent therefore, and be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of your sins and you too shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost (Acts 2:38-39). Please take the time to look up the scriptures listed in this study (Acts 17:11).

Misleading labels in the nutrition, skincare and cosmetic industry has caused many of us all to spend so much money on products that simply don't perform the way you thought they would. The one size fits all philosophy has never worked for me, and if you are of the same thinking, this group is for you. 

My passion is to share with you what I have learned over the years and bring new understanding to you on how our bodies work; from the inside out. Learn how your skin functions & ages and how to treat it on any budget. Customize your makeup regimen from the right foundation to the perfect finishing touches.    Discover how your digestive health affects every organ of your body, and how to adjust accordingly. 

Feel your very best at any age. Why would we settle for anything less? 

Come out and join us for fun & informative skin & makeup workshops which cover all the beauty basics and then some! Let's end the madness, share our experiences and empower each other. 

All are welcome with reservations appreciated for each workshop, the first one is my gift to you. Choose your interest, mark your calendar, and we'll see you soon!

Let the beauty of what you love, show in everything you do.

Jodi Usher         

www.shopusher.com

results.description:
This is a brand NEW Toastmasters club that is forming in Edison, NJ named "What Exit? Toastmasters" This club is geared towards anyone looking to improve their speaking and leadership skills while having fun and making new friends. We will hold one regular monthly meeting at 3 pm on the 3rd Saturday afternoon of each month with potential additional monthly meetings or events to follow. At What Exit? Toastmasters, we understand you're busy. Your commute and/or work schedule probably prevents you from taking some time to get out, work on your development and network as you'd like so when you DO come to work on these skills we also want you to experience a friendly environment, with a good sense of humor.

Just a few reasons you should visit What Exit 
1. Convenient Centrally located weekend afternoon meetings - no worries about trying to find time during your lunch break or after work. We meet the 3rd Saturday of each month at 3 pm in Edison, NJ, leaving you plenty of time for weekend plans/family and other commitments 
2. Increase your communication skills - not only speaking but listening! Strong communication skills help you both personally and professionally.
3. A chance to be part of a 91 year strong professional international organization with unlimited networking opportunities
4. Advance your communication and leadership skills at your own pace with real time feedback from mentors and fellow members 
5. Cost of a professional development seminar - thousands of dollars. Cost of a community college credit in NJ $100+. Monthly dues for What Exit? - only $7 a month. 
6. Earn education credentials that you can put on your resume to advance your career
7. Because we have the best club name in NJ and you're just going to sound cool to say you're a member 
8. Get the opportunity to help start a brand new club and help contribute to its success! 
9. Optional social events after each meeting to help you meet people and make connections as well as have fun!
10. Overcome your fear of public speaking and learn to think on your feet with impromptu speaking 
11. Warm, welcome, encouraging and supportive environment! 
12. Prepare for your next work presentation, sales pitch, interview in a safe environment 
13. Pick up or enhance skills in marketing, time management, project management, delegation, budgeting, record keeping and more
14. You get to have FUN while you do all of the above!

What are you waiting for? Come to our next info meeting and bring a friend (or multiple friends!)

results.description:
Are you searching for meaning in your life?
Have you ever felt happiness in your life...
...never lasts?

This Buddhist group has a great positive, multi-cultural atmosphere that helps people search for the answer to life's biggest questions.
Through the teachings of Buddha and historical Pure Land Buddhist teachers we understand better the direction our life needs to take in order to find the purpose of life.
We offer video lectures and have meetings to discuss how to obtain an absolute form of happiness.
I hope you'll stop by and attend a meeting when you have a chance!

Below, you'll find some more information about what Buddhism is all about as well as our contact info and location.
In Buddhism, we learn that there are two kinds of joy.

Relative Happiness

All the happiness we know is called Relative Happiness.
Money, status, fame, wealth, family, friends, and our loved ones are all included in this category.
Politics, economics, medicine, and the arts also try to provide us with Relative happiness.
We seek for this type of happiness day in, day out hoping we can attain true satisfaction from it.

Absolute Happiness

We are all seeking for a happiness which will truly last.
This kind of happiness is called Absolute Happiness.
The purpose of life is to attain it as quickly as possible while still alive.

Learn more at our meetups and check out some of our topics:
The Law of Cause and Effect
Six Good Deeds that Bring Happiness
Mirror of Truth
Dark Mind is the Root Cause of Suffering
results.name: New York Buddhism and Purpose of Life Meetup

results.description:
The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) New York Chapter is a professional networking and educational association of 750+ Members in ten specialty Forums. IIDA NY provides our Members with the resources to reach expertise, knowledge and contacts. Networking and social events allow professionals and industry members to connect on more personal terms that encourage trust, collaboration, and innovation.

Our Chapter is proud to have been recognized as IIDA Large Chapter of the Year in 2011, 2008, 2001 and 2000.

The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) is the Commercial Interior Design Association with a global reach. We support design professionals, industry affiliates, educators, students, firms and their clients through our network of 15,000+ Members across 58 countries. We advocate for advancements in education, design excellence, legislation, leadership, accreditation, and community outreach to increase the value and understanding of Interior Design as a profession that enhances business value and positively impacts the health and well-being of people’s lives every day.

Visit us at http://www.iidany.org

results.description:
Technical competency and problem solving skills are essential to the success of our children. Many initiatives have been introduced to provide more STEM education; however, the efforts have largely focused on older children, mostly high school and junior high school students. Research suggests that children should be exposed to technology at an earlier age so that it becomes second nature to them. To that end, a new space is under construction to provide hands-on experience in technology to elementary school aged children (pre-K to 5th graders). Children will experiment with technology by building and programming robots, coding with Scratch/Blockly, creating animations and websites, designing circuit-based projects, and much, much more. We anticipate an early spring launch. 

In the meantime, we would welcome any volunteer who is interested in advancing this initiative to please contact us and let us know how you would like to help. We are a nonprofit organization (501(c)3 designation is in the works). We would love to hear from you!

results.description:
Ever find your self hunting ANSWERS in the business, psychology or self-help sections of bookstores, ONLINE or doing Yoga? What if you could upgrade your thoughts, feelings,habits and future like the apps on your tablet or smartphone? Are you stuck and can't get your life moving faster. What if there are NEW methods to RESET your life like when your smartphone freezes. "UPGRADE And RESET YOUR LIFE" provides tools that will make you happier, more passionate about life, more productive on your dreams, and wealthier. We will get you to "do life" and not just learn "about" it. You will make discoveries about yourself, stop negative thoughts, develop better habits, evolve beyond your wildest dreams. Each session you will practical cognitive tools to immediately take your life to the next level.
This is Not the lecture format you have seen and done many times in the past, there are better ways to learn and gain rapid results.

                                                  Forming A Community Of Shared "Specific Mind" Practices 

Our mission is to build a wide community of friends, family, and coworkers using New-art and other tools together during meetup sessions and in their daily lives.
What makes this different from anything else in the world, is each member will work on their "Specific Mind." For the first time ever people interested in self-improvement will work on their "Specific Mind" instead of an abstract philosophy of how people should work.
There are tools that can effect both emotions and habits. Like brain mapping you will learn to capture your specific unique mind, take measurements of habits, thoughts and emotions. Place the palm of your hand on your forehead. You are now centimeters form your frontal and prefrontal cortex. This is only one brain system out of the many that produce your unique personality and habits profile. We will take abstract concepts and transform them through the knowledge of neural science and physics into powerful physical tools you can touch. Self directed improvement could be so much more than short-lived inspiration.


                                                        Each SESSION Will Use New Art

A combination of cognitive, Neuro science and visual Art designed to unlock the architecture of your mind hidden within the vast landscape of your brain. New Art will allow each person to understand their own "Specific-Mind" like a MRI for the mind. The primary emphasis of New Art is developing self-awareness and choices. It becomes easy to literally see your limitations and problems while also seeing powerful solutions no other tools can provide. You will enhance the best of yourself while upgrading your life in ways beyond your dreams. Join this group to start UPGRADING YOUR LIFE each week. You will have fun while making real changes in your life. 

Each Session members will hold in their hands printed sheets of Art work they will use to record parts of their minds, solve problems, communicate with their minds (different from meditation), record measurements of mental activity. With the Art Work members of the community will be able to show each others what they are working on each week. Personal improvement moves form a philosophical talk to show me your Art work and what you are working on. Members will select projects and goals they will work on as individuals and within the community making possible everything form habit change, weight release, less stress, greater mental focus, solving business problems, removing fears and anxieties, becoming free from shyness, emotional clarity and more.  


GAIN CLARITY ABOUT WHAT YOU REALLY WANT IN YOUR BUSINESS AND PERSONAL LIFE

MAKE REAL CHANGES TO YOUR THOUGHTS, FEELINGS AND ACTIONS

DISCOVER THE HIDDEN ASSETS NEEDED TO BUILD YOUR FUTURE

TRANSFORM YOUR PAST INTO AN INVALUABLE SOURCE OF NEW POSSIBILITIES

USE YOUR EMOTIONS AS RESOURCES

YOU WILL DISCOVER HOW TO SET AND ACHIEVE GOALS IN THE REAL WORLD

DRAMATICALLY ENHANCE YOUR COMMUNICATION SKILLS

EACH SESSION WILL BE WILL BUILD ON THE LAST AND TAKE TO THE NEXT STEP

this is a support circle for moms in all situations, be it maternity leave, a stay at home mom and whose also new to Montclair, maybe a mom who literally needs a network because they are having a difficult time with post partum depression or even anxiety.  as a friend to many women from my moms group in Hoboken, a mom friend from the mother's center of central new jersey, I know mom friends who are extremely uncomfortable in their shell as a stay at home mom and I know the moms who always wanted to b stay at home moms.   i know moms who love their job and would never give it up even if they hit the lottery.  it doesn't matter if u work and have some time to spend away from your kids, u deserve this group. 

who wouldn't receive more smiles and laughs in their day if they could?   sometimes people even act differently if they are home sweeping and burping a child all day than when they perform at work. there has been studies on it. sometimes isolation occurs not to mention losing yourself in your child. it happens esp if u r a perfectionist like me. 

this is a support group for moms, it can b a networking group for moms, (lots of working full time moms are insecure that they don't know other mom friends.) most importantly id like you to c this as a friendship circle of moms who will know one another for a very very long time.  leave all your biases at the door, and take a rest once a week with us.  lets rest once a week and talk see how many of our lives are surprisingly the same.

cheers

piper

results.description:
WorldChoiceModels is where models take charge and host events for photographers in a variety of themes and locations: Bridal shoots, engagement shoots, portraits, fashion, action, sport, lifestyle, commercial branding, etc. Photographers can also request for themed events. Events are limited to 4 photographers. Most models seem to prefer 3 photographers. Those events with more than 4 are called paparazzi shoot-outs, they typically cost less. Some events are meet and greets or promotional events.

The models chosen to be on the team have been interviewed and have passed a series of criteria to participate. These models are professional and work well beyond the time behind the camera: They scout locations, contact venues, determine if permits are required or not and obtain them if feasible. Some events require they rent wardrobe or equipment and it doesn't need to be explained that there is a great deal of time doing all of that. This group nor the models do any TFPs... Ever. What's nice is the photographers never have to spend any time editing, copying or distributing pictures to models. That's right. Photographers are not obligated to share their pictures nor are the models expecting any from them. WorldChoiceModels is ideal for:

• Photographers that want to do street photography or photowalks with a model. • Photographers looking to practice their skills, experiment with their equipment or technique.

• Photographers looking to expand their portfolios. bridal, senior portraits, couples, fashion, commercial lifestyle, editorial, etc. From time to time there will be workshops on studio lighting, and specific genres. So keep a look out. Hopefully changing the name will attract women photographers ,which I know are many.

This is an excellent forum to practice and build your portfolio. In the next few months you will notice some admin activity and shortly after the models will take charge,

My best to everyone

John Bodensiek
results.name: !! "Brooklyn - New York - Model Events for Photographers"

results.description:
Tribute Strength is a CrossFit gym run & operated by people with similar goals, morals & values. We are genuine people that care. Genuine people with a background in fitness, athletics & coaching. People who respect the process of becoming fit & all the obstacles along the way. We’re people just like anyone else. We have families of our own. We understand that life is a gentle and tricky balance of caring for oneself as well as our loved ones. Far too often the former gets neglected and we can say that because we’ve been there. We’ve been down that road. Ultimately we decided it was time to make time. Time to make fitness a goal and embrace the truth that is the fragility of life. 

CrossFit is defined as, “Constantly varied functional movements performed at relatively high intensity.” It combines cardiovascular endurance, weightlifting & gymnastics to form the foundation of measurable fitness & health. Often performed in a class & teamwork atmosphere, CrossFit prides itself on community. It’s that very community or team that makes working hard fun. The philosophy, in a nutshell, at Tribute Strength is to get ourselves and our members fit, happy and healthy. 

Intrigued? Want to learn more? We welcome you to come into Tribute and have fun, get fit & leave with a smile!


Tribute Strength - CrossFit Woodland Park

20 Andrews Drive - Unit 3, Woodland Park, NJ

www.tributestrength.com

Follow us on Facebook & Instagram!
results.name: Tribute Strength - CrossFit Classes!
